altername_name: Arcade Classics: Seawolf II + Gun Fight
name: Arcade Classics: Seawolf II and Gun Fight
overview: Two games in a single package. In Seawolf II, you (and potentially a friend) move subs and shoot through a minefield to take out ships above. In Gun Fight, you and an opponent (or the computer) take on the roll of gunslingers from the old west, shooting horizontally across the screen at each other.
